titleStmt.title: A conduit of comfort Preached at Sainct Iames before the Commissioners of the Vnion of the Realmes. By W. Couper, Minister of Gods word.
titleStmt.author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. White] for W. Ferbrand, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Pops-head Allie [sic], neare the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe in Pops-head Allie [sic], neare the Exchange
